inclusion.criterion: Greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Hemoglobin SS sickle cell disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient identifies history of pain as a significant problem during at least 2 days in the month prior to enrollment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent/assent has been obtained
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling to experience hypnosis or to have hetero-hypnosis sessions recorded
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Non-fluency in written and spoken English
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Physical or other disabilities that prevent adequate participation in hypnotic susceptibility testing
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Does not wish to be video and audiotaped
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell crises since childhood and had severe pain in his lower back that radiated to both thighs scored 9 out of 10. He also had the same symptoms in past two weeks treated with oxycodone which was not beneficial to his pain.
